t_video_report_event::clip_card_12::goal: Show the result of people interacting at the event.
t_video_report_event::title: Event Video
t_video_report_event::clip_card_6::goals: Ask someone who is in the event: Why is this event interesting?
t_video_report_event::clip_card_14::goal: Show something the character talks about at the event.
t_video_report_event::clip_card_2::goals: Show something notable about the event.
t_video_report_event::clip_card_10::goal: Show people interacting at the event.
t_video_report_event::clip_card_7::goals: Show a place important to the event.
t_video_report_event::text_card_0::text: This template will help you report on an event in your community. In video, news reports are typically carried by narration. The clips suggested cover the primary shots you will need to tell the story of most events. Feel free to skip shots, or use different shots as needed. Additionally, adapt the suggested questions to suit your needs.
t_video_report_event::clip_card_8::goals: Ask an Expert to talk about the event.
t_video_report_event::clip_card_3::goals: Ask a person to introduce the event.
t_video_report_event::clip_card_15::goal: If it’s a different location, show where the event ends.
t_video_report_event::clip_card_4::goals: Show what happens at the event.
t_video_report_event::clip_card_16::goal: Show the end of the event.
t_video_report_event::clip_card_9::goals: Show something happening at the event.
t_video_report_event::clip_card_13::goal: Ask someone attending the event to talk about what they did.
t_video_report_event::clip_card_11::goal: Ask: What happens at the event?
t_video_report_event::clip_card_5::goals: Show something important to the event.
